title: Social Psychology Quarterly - Denigrating Women, Venerating “Chad”: Ingroup and Outgroup Evaluations among Male Supremacists on Reddit
itunes:title: Social Psychology Quarterly - Denigrating Women, Venerating “Chad”: Ingroup and Outgroup Evaluations among Male Supremacists on Reddit
description: Author Katherine Furl discusses her article, "Denigrating Women, Venerating “Chad”: Ingroup and Outgroup Evaluations among Male Supremacists on Reddit," published in the September 2022 issue of Social Psychology Quarterly.
